column4: I have problems playing .mov files. I've installed all the codecs from automatix and still get the no stream error in mplayer
any ideas what I can be doing wrong
automatix is a black box for most of us... we can not know what it has done wrong...
I've tried installing all the codecs from the repositories before using automatix including the bad and ugly ones
for mov files you need w32codecs afaik
it works for me... i do not know what can be wrong...
uh sorry I'm dumb it's working now :)
why do you say that bundle driver are out of date?
the drivers in the kernel are an older version and the external storage I'm connecting to the HBA doesn't want to work on UTRA320 speed
and I got a response from technical support from adaptec that I should update it with the ones on the promise webpage but I don't know how to apply the source code to the kernel
i have dl the drivers and afaics you have to replace the folder drivers/scsi/aic7xxx of the kernel sources with the one you dl from the website
I tried it but I got an error when I tried to compile it
which version of ubuntu are you using?
pretty recent i thought you were using dapper... my next advice is to download the gutsy server kernel and try it
can you post the error you are getting on a pastebin (compiling)
